snippet.title: Honkai Impact 3rd Animated Short: Graduation Trip
snippet.description:
*Spoiler Alert
Fate once questioned the world
So the hero gave an answer
Across the endless samsara
Create a story for everyone
This animated short is presented by miHoYo Anime. Its theme song Da Capo is produced by miHoYo's in-house music team HOYO-MiX.

Download the game now: https://hoyo.link/b3sICOAd
Visit Honkai Impact 3rd Official Website:
https://hoyo.link/c3G4BUAd

Join Official Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/hi3
